sentences.english: Tori Ritchie says it's great year-round, and for fish and veggies, too.
sentences.chinese: 托丽里奇说，他是伟大的全年性，为鱼类和蔬菜，太。

sentences.english: The government’s full-year inflation target is 3 percent.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府全年的通货膨胀率目标为3%。

sentences.english: Though it went on year round, the height of cricket fighting was between the summer solstice and autumn equinox.
sentences.chinese: 虽然它了全年的高度板球战斗之间的夏至和秋分。

sentences.english: On a sunny northern coast, there are wonderful activities throughout the year.
sentences.chinese: 在阳光灿烂的蔚蓝海岸，全年都有精彩活动。

sentences.english: Some schools have a year-round schedule.
sentences.chinese: 有些学校有一个全年教学安排表。

sentences.english: We provided job training for 1 million urban and rural workers.
sentences.chinese: 全年组织100万城乡劳动者插手职业培训。

sentences.english: In general , Scotland is colder throughout the year .
sentences.chinese: 总的来说，苏格兰全年较冷。

sentences.english: Its operating margin for the full year will likely remain at the same level, Mr.
sentences.chinese: 王振堂说，全年的经营利润可能也将保持在这一水平。

sentences.english: This clock carries a full-year guarantee.
The fast-food giant also bumped up its full-year outlook.
sentences.chinese: 该快餐业巨头同时提升了其全年盈利目标。

sentences.english: In Nosy Be, ylang ylang blooms all year round.
sentences.chinese: 要在岛，依兰依兰开花全年。

sentences.english: Honda scored just six points all year courtesy of team-mate Jenson Button.
sentences.chinese: 本田全年只积了6分，还都归功他的队友花顿。

sentences.english: Since the law changed, it also runs more frequent promotions throughout the year.
sentences.chinese: 自从法令更改后，该公司全年的促销活动也更频繁了。

sentences.english: Full Year Museum Pass is valid within 12 months from the date of issue.
sentences.chinese: 博物馆全年入场证有效期为发证日期起12个月内。

sentences.english: It is geographically located In southern Europe, with the year-round warm climate of Mediterranean attribution.
sentences.chinese: 处于欧洲南部，全年气候温暖，属于地中海气候。

sentences.english: HKIM Annual Activity Discount Pass is not applicable to this course.
sentences.chinese: 全年活动折扣优惠证并不适用于此课程。

definition: the corresponding time period (in a different year etc)/concurrent/synchronous
